casebody.data:
IN RE: ACCUTANE LITIGATION M-886 September Term 2017
079958 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 12, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the New Jersey Association for Justice for leave to file a brief and argue as amicus curiae is granted. The parties may serve and file briefs in response on or before April 2, 2018. Oral argument is limited to five minutes.
